CustomField.description:
Its not possible to insert directly Today value in the Template, below are the approach to resolve your today date value.
Create a formula field in the relevant object and use the field in your template.
CustomField.formula:
CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, "Sunday", 1, "Monday", 2, "Tuesday", 3, "Wednesday", 4, "Thursday", 5, "Friday", 6, "Saturday","No Weekday")
+ ', ' +
CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "No Month")
+ ' ' + TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) + ', ' + TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))
CustomField.label: Today
